scripts.build:verification: pnpm --recursive --filter "./packages/*" run type-check && pnpm --filter verified-accounts build
scripts.build:governance: pnpm --recursive --filter "./packages/*" run type-check && pnpm --filter citizens-house build
scripts.build:contract:verification: cd contracts/verified-accounts && cargo near build non-reproducible-wasm
scripts.build:contract:governance: cd contracts/governance && cargo near build non-reproducible-wasm
scripts.build:contract:bridge: cd contracts/sputnik-bridge && cargo near build non-reproducible-wasm
scripts.build:contracts:all: pnpm run build:contract:verification && pnpm run build:contract:governance && pnpm run build:contract:bridge
scripts.test:contracts:all: pnpm run test:contract:verification && pnpm run test:contract:governance && pnpm run test:contract:bridge
scripts.lint:contracts:all: pnpm run lint:contract:verification && pnpm run lint:contract:governance && pnpm run lint:contract:bridge
scripts.check:contract:verification: cd contracts/verified-accounts && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo check --target wasm32-unknown-unknown
scripts.check:contract:governance: cd contracts/governance && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo check --target wasm32-unknown-unknown
scripts.lint:all: pnpm run lint && pnpm run lint:contracts:all
scripts.test:all: pnpm run test && pnpm run test:contracts:all
scripts.clean:contracts:all: pnpm run clean:contracts:verification && pnpm run clean:contracts:governance && pnpm run clean:contracts:bridge
